title: A champion is NOT broken if you die to them while turret diving
body:
Well, this was a while ago, but I might as well tell you what happened.

I was playing Talon top lane and the enemy Yasuo was afk, so their jungler, Taliyah, takes over the lane. The thing was, she was level 3 and I was only level 2. I got pretty low due to her Q and was farming under tower. Eventually, I got poked so much i was forced further under the tower. Then, Taliyah dives me. She was full health and I had a quarter of health. She Ws but I walk away from it just as she deploys her E. She's right next to me now, so I point blank Q her and she dies. In the all chat pops, "wow, Riot really needs to nerf Talon, such a no skill broken champ"

I mean, yes, Talon is one of the easiest champs to play but if you set yourself up for a stupid dive and get yourself killed, it's your fault, not the champion's. It's the same if you die to a Thresh when you tried to dive him but he CCs you until the turret agro kills you. It's not just the champion that made you die, it was yourself as well. Turret diving is a high risk, high reward task in the early game, yes but you have to think about the circumstances and if your enemy has the potential to kite your abilities.

Moral of the Story? Don't dive a champion, die and blame the champion for being no skill/broken because you died.

and yes, Talon probably does need some nerfs
